mapper.sql: epdop.id as epdop_id,epdop.purchase_delivery_order_id as epdop_purchase_delivery_order_id,epdop.purchase_order_product_id as epdop_purchase_order_product_id,epdop.product_id as epdop_product_id,epdop.product_name as epdop_product_name,epdop.product_sku_id as epdop_product_sku_id,epdop.product_snapshot as epdop_product_snapshot,epdop.product_count as epdop_product_count,epdop.real_product_id as epdop_real_product_id,epdop.real_product_name as epdop_real_product_name,epdop.real_product_sku_id as epdop_real_product_sku_id,epdop.real_product_snapshot as epdop_real_product_snapshot,epdop.real_product_count as epdop_real_product_count,epdop.product_amount as epdop_product_amount,epdop.remark as epdop_remark,epdop.create_time as epdop_create_time,epdop.create_user as epdop_create_user,epdop.update_time as epdop_update_time,epdop.update_user as epdop_update_user

epdom.id AS epdom_id,epdom.purchase_delivery_order_id AS epdom_purchaseDeliveryOrderId,epdom.purchase_order_material_id AS epdom_purchaseOrderMaterialId,epdom.material_id AS epdom_materialId,epdom.material_name AS epdom_materialName,epdom.material_snapshot AS epdom_materialSnapshot,epdom.material_count AS epdom_materialCount,epdom.material_amount AS epdom_materialAmount,epdom.real_material_id AS epdom_realMaterialId,epdom.real_material_name AS epdom_realMaterialName,epdom.real_material_snapshot AS epdom_realMaterialSnapshot,epdom.real_material_count AS epdom_realMaterialCount,epdom.real_material_amount AS epdom_realMaterialAmount,epdom.data_status AS epdom_dataStatus,epdom.remark AS epdom_remark,epdom.create_time AS epdom_createTime,epdom.create_user AS epdom_createUser,epdom.update_time AS epdom_updateTime,epdom.update_user AS epdom_updateUser
mapper.select: select from erp_purchase_delivery_order epdo where epdo.id = #{id, jdbcType=INTEGER} and data_status = 1

select ,, ,es1.supplier_name,epo.purchase_no purchase_order_no from ( select from erp_purchase_delivery_order epdo where epdo.purchase_delivery_no = #{purchaseDeliveryNo, jdbcType=VARCHAR} and data_status = 1 ) epdo left join erp_purchase_delivery_order_product epdop on epdo.id = epdop.purchase_delivery_order_id and epdop.data_status=1 left join erp_purchase_delivery_order_material epdom on epdo.id = epdom.purchase_delivery_order_id and epdom.data_status=1 left join erp_supplier es1 on epdo.owner_supplier_id = es1.id left join erp_purchase_order epo on epo.id=epdo.purchase_order_id

SELECT ,,,es1.supplier_name,epo.purchase_no purchase_order_no FROM ( SELECT FROM erp_purchase_delivery_order epdo WHERE epdo.purchase_order_id = #{purchaseOrderId, jdbcType=INTEGER} AND epdo.data_status = 1 ) epdo LEFT JOIN erp_purchase_delivery_order_product epdop ON epdop.purchase_delivery_order_id = epdo.id AND epdop.data_status = 1 left join erp_purchase_delivery_order_material epdom on epdo.id = epdom.purchase_delivery_order_id and epdom.data_status=1 left join erp_supplier es1 on epdo.owner_supplier_id = es1.id left join erp_purchase_order epo on epo.id=epdo.purchase_order_id

select count(epdo.id) from erp_purchase_delivery_order epdo
and epdo.data_status = 1
